# Qtile dotfiles

## Dependencies:
- Nitrogen
  - Archlinux-wallpaper
- Zsh & Oh my Zsh
- Alacritty
- Rofi
- Qtile-extras
- Scrot
- Qtile layout icons extra (already included)
